name: YouTube+
description: This script adds rounded borders to Youtube as well as removing the Google Chrome advertisements, Promoted Videos, and ads. It is also very compatible with other styles.
additional_info:
Update May 28, 2010: Removed new Promoted Videos area in search results.

Update Jan 22, 2009: Removed new Promoted Video area in playlists.

Update Oct 15, 2009: Rounded a few minor things around the site.

Update Sept 28, 2009: Rounded a variety of new things, notably some things in the new v2 profile.

Update Sept 23, 2009: Removed new Google Doubleclick Ads (not in the flash player though, CSS doesn't manage that).

Update Sept 19, 2009: Updated v1 profiles.

View the full changelog at http://pxlbuzzard.com/extra/youtube+changelog.html

discussions.name: Promoted Videos are still shown whether you login
